short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes the broken censoring on the Game of Thrones® Winter is Coming™ game chat system. It may add dragons too, maybe...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of not being able to type 'diamonds', 'consider', 'I am ...'?

If you have played on Game of Thrones® Winter is Coming™ you have surely noticed the broken chat censoring. It just tries too hard yet fails of a lot of other words...

This extension fixes just that. It adds two extra features (as of now):
 * Disables the (useless) chat censoring.
 * Auto-closes the side panel (see screenshot)

All features can be enable/disabled in the options page.

Feedback and requests are welcome. Free time is scares though :P

PS: [ALI] - Alicity is the friendliest alliance with the best team players :)

Known limitation: does not work when you paste copied text.

Changelog:

28 April 2019, v1.2.5 - Fixed the other slash, yay \o/

11 April 2019, v1.2.4 - Alternative fix 'f', previous solution was problematic on some systems.

10 April 2019, v1.2.3 - Uncensored words with 's','f' and 'T'.

09 April 2019, v1.2.2 - Fixed forward slashes being removed (does not make links work though).

06 April 2019, v1.2.1 - Uncensored 'gn' (eg: si** -> sign).

05 April 2019, v1.2.1 - Uncensored words with vowels.
